zellij.strategies.metaheuristic module

class zellij.strategies.metaheuristic.Metaheuristic(loss_func, search_space, f_calls, save=False, verbose=False)

Bases: object

Metaheuristic is a core object which define the structure of a metaheuristic in zellij.

loss_func

Loss function to optimize. must be of type f(x)=y

Type

LossFunc

search_space

Search space object containing bounds of the search space.

Type

Searchspace

f_calls

Maximum number of loss_func calls

Type

int

save

if True save results into a file

Type

boolean, optional

verbose

Algorithm verbosity

Type

boolean, default=True

create_file(self, \*args)

Create a saving file.

See also

LossFunc

Parent class for a loss function.

Searchspace

Define what a search space is in Zellij.

Methods

create_file(*args)

run

show
create_file(*args)

create_file(self, *args)s

Create a saving file.

Parameters

*args (list[label]) – list of additionnal labels to add before the score/evaluation of a point.
